## Project Requirements
- Full-featured Flask web app for school marksheet management and reporting
- Pre-inserted data from cleaned CSVs
- Student search/filter, automated reports, export/print

## Project Structure
- app/
  - static/
  - templates/
  - data/
  - reports/
- .github/
- README.md
